meanings.definition: Situated on the other side or across from something.
meanings.sent1: The house on the opposite side of the street is painted blue.
meanings.sent2: The opposite direction led us to the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat on the opposite chair, pretending to be the king of the room.
meanings.sent4: Her cheerful personality was the opposite of his gloomy demeanor.
meanings.sent5: The bright sun on one side of the street was the opposite of the dark clouds on the other side.

meanings.definition: Completely different or contrary in nature, quality, or effect.
meanings.sent1: Their tastes in music were completely opposite.
meanings.sent2: The hot weather was the opposite of the cold winter days.
meanings.sent3: The cat's love for water was the opposite of what most cats prefer.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was the opposite of his frantic behavior.
meanings.sent5: The loud music was the opposite of the peaceful silence in the library.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is completely different from or contrary to another.
meanings.sent1: She was his complete opposite in every way.
meanings.sent2: The twins were like opposites, one loving sports and the other loving art.
meanings.sent3: The dog, who hated water, was the opposite of his brother who loved swimming.
meanings.sent4: In the debate, she represented the opposite of what the other candidate stood for.
meanings.sent5: The two friends were opposites, one always early and the other always late.
